title: Authors and Citation
text: De Martino M (2025). MixMashNet: Tools multilayer single-layer Network Modeling. R package version 0.1.0, https://github.com/ARCbiostat/MixMashNet.
code: @Manual{,   title = {MixMashNet: Tools for multilayer and single-layer Network Modeling},   author = {Maria {De Martino}},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://github.com/ARCbiostat/MixMashNet}, }

what: Tools for multilayer and single-layer Network Modeling
title: Tools for multilayer and single-layer Network Modeling
text: MixMashNet R package provides unified framework estimating analysing single-layer multilayer networks using Mixed Graphical Models (MGMs). package designed analysis complex biomedical epidemiological data, allowing joint modelling conditional dependencies variables mixed types (continuous, binary, categorical), within across multiple layers.

title: Tools for multilayer and single-layer Network Modeling
text: MixMashNet provides tools : estimation homogeneous heterogeneous MGM networks; specification estimation multilayer network structures; bootstrap-based confidence intervals edges node-level indices; computation centrality bridge metrics; assessment membership stability community scores; visualisation networks associated metrics, including interactive exploration via Shiny applications.

title: Tools for multilayer and single-layer Network Modeling
text: development version MixMashNet can installed GitHub:

what: MixMashNet: Multilayer and Single-Layer Network Modeling — MixMashNet
title: MixMashNet: Multilayer and Single-Layer Network Modeling — MixMashNet
text: Tools estimating single-layer multilayer Mixed Graphical Models, bootstrap-based membership stability, centrality/bridge metrics, plotting. Includes masked estimation constrained (e.g., multilayer) structures safe graph assembly adapted mgm.

title: MixMashNet: Multilayer and Single-Layer Network Modeling — MixMashNet
text: Maintainer: Maria De Martino maria.demartino@uniud.

what: Safe graph assembly for mgm outputs (modified from mgm) — Reg2Graph_safe
title: Safe graph assembly for mgm outputs (modified from mgm) — Reg2Graph_safe
text: Robust post-processing assemble pairwise (nodewise) weighted adjacency matrices mgm-style object. variant tolerates masked designs empty parameter blocks using conservative fallbacks na.rm = TRUE appropriate. preserves structure original mgm output.

title: Safe graph assembly for mgm outputs (modified from mgm) — Reg2Graph_safe
Safe graph assembly for mgm outputs (modified from mgm) — Reg2Graph_safe
text: mgmobj object produced nodewise mgm-style routine. thresholding Logical; TRUE, applies thresholding rule recorded mgmobj$call$threshold.

title: Safe graph assembly for mgm outputs (modified from mgm) — Reg2Graph_safe
text: input object populated $pairwise matrices interaction lists.

title: Bacteremia dataset — bacteremia
text: Example dataset used MixMashNet examples. dataset contains 7240 patients clinical suspicion bacteremia underwent blood culture testing Vienna General Hospital

title: Bacteremia dataset — bacteremia
Bacteremia dataset — bacteremia
text: data frame 7420 rows 16 variables: AGE Age (numeric). WBC White blood cell (numeric). NEU Neutrophil counts (numeric). HGB Hemoglobin (numeric). PLT Platelet count (numeric). CRP C-reactive protein (numeric). APTT Activated partial thromboplastin time (numeric). FIB Fibrinogen (numeric). CREA Creatinine (numeric). BUN Blood urea nitrogen (numeric). GLU Glucose (numeric). ALAT High-sensitivity C-reactive protein (numeric). GBIL Total bilirubin (numeric). ALB Albumin (numeric). SEX Sex 0=male 1=female. BloodCulture Positive blood culture results 0=1=yes.

title: Bacteremia dataset — bacteremia

what: Bridge metrics for nodes across communities (original-style) — bridge_metrics
title: Bridge metrics for nodes across communities (original-style) — bridge_metrics
text: Computes bridge centralities nodes assigned community: bridge_strength: sum absolute weights nodes communities bridge_ei1: signed expected influence nodes communities bridge_ei2: community-weighted expected influence (networktools-like) bridge_betweenness: # times node lies shortest paths different communities bridge_closeness: inverse mean distance nodes communities

title: Bridge metrics for nodes across communities (original-style) — bridge_metrics
Bridge metrics for nodes across communities (original-style) — bridge_metrics
text: g igraph object edge attribute weight. membership Named vector/factor community labels subset nodes (names must match V(g)$name).

title: Bridge metrics for nodes across communities (original-style) — bridge_metrics
text: data.frame columns: node, cluster, bridge_strength, bridge_ei1, bridge_ei2, bridge_betweenness, bridge_closeness.

what: Bridge metrics for nodes excluded from communities (mmn) — bridge_metrics_excluded
title: Bridge metrics for nodes excluded from communities (mmn) — bridge_metrics_excluded
text: Computes bridge centrality metrics nodes assigned community (treated cluster "Z"). Uses networktools::bridge full weighted adjacency matrix community vector unassigned nodes labeled "Z".

title: Bridge metrics for nodes excluded from communities (mmn) — bridge_metrics_excluded
Bridge metrics for nodes excluded from communities (mmn) — bridge_metrics_excluded
text: g igraph graph. edge attribute weight missing, unweighted adjacency (1 edges, 0 otherwise) used. membership named vector/factor community labels subset nodes; names must match V(g)$name. Nodes present treated excluded ("Z").

title: Bridge metrics for nodes excluded from communities (mmn) — bridge_metrics_excluded
text: data.frame rows = excluded nodes columns: node, bridge_strength, bridge_closeness, bridge_betweenness, bridge_expected_influence1, bridge_expected_influence2, cluster.

title: Bridge metrics for nodes excluded from communities (mmn) — bridge_metrics_excluded
text: Returns, excluded nodes : bridge_strength bridge_closeness bridge_betweenness bridge_expected_influence1 (1-step) bridge_expected_influence2 (2-step)

what: Access internal functions from mgm safely — .mgm_fun
title: Access internal functions from mgm safely — .mgm_fun
text: Access internal functions mgm safely

title: Access internal functions from mgm safely — .mgm_fun

what: Bridge profiles of a node across communities — find_bridge_communities
title: Bridge profiles of a node across communities — find_bridge_communities
text: given node, compute strongly "bridges" communities using five profiles: strength: sum \(|w|\) nodes communities ei1: signed sum \(w\) nodes communities ei2: signed influence \(+ ^2\) nodes communities closeness: \(1 /\) mean shortest-path distance nodes communities; paths computed \(|W|\) edge length \(1/|w|\) betweenness: number inter-community shortest paths (graph closeness, unweighted path search) pass node intermediate (path multiplicity counted)

title: Bridge profiles of a node across communities — find_bridge_communities
Bridge profiles of a node across communities — find_bridge_communities
text: fit object class mixMN_fit containing least: $graph$keep_nodes_graph: character vector node names (graph vertex set); $statistics$edge$true: data.frame columns edge ("–b") weight (signed). (optional) $communities$groups: named factor communities subset nodes. node Character scalar: node interest; must belong fit$graph$keep_nodes_graph.

title: Bridge profiles of a node across communities — find_bridge_communities
text: list components: strength list overall (numeric) by_comm (tibble: community, sum_abs_w). ei1 list overall by_comm (tibble: community, sum_signed_w). ei2 list overall by_comm (tibble: community, sum_signed_w2). closeness list overall by_comm (tibble: community, inv_mean_dist). betweenness list overall by_pair (tibble: Ci, Cj, hits).

title: Bridge profiles of a node across communities — find_bridge_communities
text: Notes: signed adjacency \(W\) rebuilt exactly fit$statistics$edge$true (symmetric, diagonal set 0). "communities" means targets whose community differs node's community; node unassigned (NA), targets assigned nodes. Betweenness counts per path (multiplicity). Endpoints always assigned nodes different communities. focal node may assigned unassigned; counted intermediate (never endpoint).

what: Node stability from bootstrap community assignments — membershipStab
title: Node stability from bootstrap community assignments — membershipStab
text: Computes per-node stability given empirical community structure homogenized bootstrap memberships contained mixMN_fit object. Stability expressed proportion bootstrap replications assign node empirical (original) community.

title: Node stability from bootstrap community assignments — membershipStab
Node stability from bootstrap community assignments — membershipStab
text: fit object returned mixMN() (class mixMN_fit), containing $communities$original_membership $communities$boot_memberships. Bootstrap memberships must available, .e. reps > 0 "community" %% boot_what. .plot Logical; TRUE, prints stability plot via internal helper membershipStab_plot().

title: Node stability from bootstrap community assignments — membershipStab
text: object class c("membershipStab"), components: membership List : empirical Named integer vector empirical community labels bootstrap Matrix homogenized bootstrap labels (reps × p) membership.stability List : empirical.dimensions Named numeric vector node-level stability (proportion assigned empirical community) .dimensions Matrix (p × K) proportions assignment community community_palette Named vector colors communities, available

title: Node stability from bootstrap community assignments — membershipStab
text: Bootstrap community labels first aligned empirical solution using EGAnet::community.homogenize(). Stability computed node-wise proportion bootstrap runs node's community matches empirical assignment.

title: Node-by-community stability table — membershipStab_table
text: Returns data frame node--community stability proportions, optionally rounded; zero entries replaced NA readability.

title: Node-by-community stability table — membershipStab_table
Node-by-community stability table — membershipStab_table
text: stab_obj object membershipStab(). digits Integer; decimal places rounding.

title: Node-by-community stability table — membershipStab_table
text: data.frame rows = nodes columns = communities (D1..DK).

title: Masked MGM (modified from mgm) — mgm_masked
text: modified version model-fitting routine mgm adds support per-node predictor mask via mask_list. provided, node estimated using allowed predictors specified node. functionality mirrors original mgm nodewise estimation graph assembly.

title: Masked MGM (modified from mgm) — mgm_masked
code: mgm_masked(   data,   type,   level,   regularize,   lambdaSeq,   lambdaSel,   lambdaFolds,   lambdaGam,   alphaSeq,   alphaSel,   alphaFolds,   alphaGam,   k,   moderators,   ruleReg,   weights,   threshold,   method,   binarySign,   scale,   verbatim,   pbar,   warnings,   saveModels,   saveData,   overparameterize,   thresholdCat,   signInfo,   mask_list = NULL,   ... )

title: Masked MGM (modified from mgm) — mgm_masked
text: data Numeric matrix (n × p). missing values allowed. type Character vector length p variable types mgm (e.g., "g" Gaussian, "c" categorical, "p" Poisson). level Integer vector length p variable levels mgm. regularize Logical; FALSE, equivalent regularization (lambdaSel = "EBIC", lambdaSeq = 0, threshold = "none"). lambdaSeq, lambdaSel, lambdaFolds, lambdaGam Lambda grid/selection settings (see mgm). alphaSeq, alphaSel, alphaFolds, alphaGam Mixing parameter grid/selection (see mgm). k Interaction order (default 2); meaning mgm. moderators Optional moderators specification (mgm). ruleReg Regularization rule, default "" (mgm). weights Observation weights (length n); internally normalized. threshold Thresholding rule (default "LW") mgm. method Fitting backend (default "glm") mgm. binarySign Logical; TRUE, store sign information. scale Logical; TRUE, standardize Gaussian variables. verbatim, pbar, warnings, saveModels, saveData Overhead/UX flags mgm. overparameterize Logical; use overparameterized design matrix (mgm). thresholdCat Logical; categorical thresholding (mgm). signInfo Logical; store sign information (mgm). mask_list Optional list length p; element integer vector column indices (1..p) indicating predictors allowed nodewise regression corresponding target node. NULL, masking applied. ... arguments forwarded consistently mgm.

title: Masked MGM (modified from mgm) — mgm_masked
text: object class c("mgm","core") fields analogous mgm: $pairwise$: wadj, signs, nodewise variants. $interactions$, $intercepts$, $nodemodels$: mgm. $call$: input metadata (types, levels, thresholds, etc.).

title: Masked MGM (modified from mgm) — mgm_masked
text: function adapted mgm workflow preserves nodewise estimation, cross-validation / EBIC selection, thresholding, graph assembly. substantive extension mask_list, filters node's design matrix allowed predictors fitting. enables constrained structures (e.g., multilayer masks) keeping mgm’s estimation logic intact.

what: Estimate MGM network with bootstrap centrality, bridge metrics, clustering, and (optionally) community scores with CIs — mixMN
title: Estimate MGM network with bootstrap centrality, bridge metrics, clustering, and (optionally) community scores with CIs — mixMN
text: Estimates Mixed Graphical Model (MGM) network original data performs non-parametric bootstrap (row resampling) compute centrality indices, bridge metrics, clustering stability, confidence intervals (CIs) node metrics edge weights. Optionally computes community network scores CIs bootstrap arrays.

title: Estimate MGM network with bootstrap centrality, bridge metrics, clustering, and (optionally) community scores with CIs — mixMN
code: mixMN(   data,   type,   level,   reps = 100,   scale = TRUE,   lambdaSel = c("CV", "EBIC"),   lambdaFolds = 5,   lambdaGam = 0.25,   alphaSeq = 1,   alphaSel = "CV",   alphaFolds = 5,   alphaGam = 0.25,   k = 2,   ruleReg = "AND",   threshold = "LW",   overparameterize = FALSE,   thresholdCat = TRUE,   conf_level = 0.95,   exclude_from_graph = NULL,   exclude_from_cluster = NULL,   treat_singletons_as_excluded = FALSE,   seed_model = NULL,   seed_boot = NULL,   cluster_method = c("louvain", "fast_greedy", "infomap", "walktrap", "edge_betweenness"),   compute_community_scores = FALSE,   boot_what = c("general_index", "bridge_index", "excluded_index", "community",     "community_scores", "none"),   progress = TRUE )

title: Estimate MGM network with bootstrap centrality, bridge metrics, clustering, and (optionally) community scores with CIs — mixMN
text: data Matrix data.frame (n × p) variables columns. type, level Vectors required mgm::mgm. reps Integer (>= 0). Number bootstrap replications. scale Logical; TRUE (default) Gaussian variables (type == "g") z-standardized internally mgm(). Use scale = FALSE data already standardized. lambdaSel Method lambda selection: "CV" "EBIC". lambdaFolds Number folds CV (lambdaSel = "CV"). lambdaGam EBIC gamma parameter (lambdaSel = "EBIC"). alphaSeq Alpha parameters elastic net penalty (values 0 1). alphaSel Method selecting alpha parameter: "CV" "EBIC". alphaFolds Number folds CV (alphaSel = "CV"). alphaGam EBIC gamma parameter (alphaSel = "EBIC"). k Integer (>= 1). Order modeled interactions. ruleReg Rule combine neighborhood estimates: "" "". threshold Threshold edge-weights set zero: "LW", "HW" "none". overparameterize Logical; TRUE uses -parameterized version mgm. thresholdCat Logical; FALSE thresholds categorical variables set zero. conf_level Confidence level percentile bootstrap CIs (default 0.95). Must single number 0 1 (e.g., 0.90, 0.95, 0.99). exclude_from_graph Character vector. Nodes excluded graph node-level metrics. exclude_from_cluster Character vector. Nodes excluded community detection (addition exclude_from_graph). treat_singletons_as_excluded Logical; TRUE, singleton communities (size 1) treated excluded nodes computing bridge metrics. seed_model, seed_boot Optional numeric seeds reproducibility original MGM fit bootstrap replications, respectively. cluster_method Community detection algorithm used thresholded absolute adjacency matrix: "louvain", "fast_greedy", "infomap", "walktrap", "edge_betweenness". compute_community_scores Logical; TRUE, compute community network scores (EGAnet std.scores) CIs bootstrap arrays. boot_what Character vector specifying quantities bootstrap. Can include: "general_index": strength, expected influence 1-step, harmonic closeness, betweenness. "bridge_index": bridge strength, bridge expected influence 1- 2-step, bridge closeness, bridge betweenness (nodes communities). "excluded_index": bridge metrics nodes excluded communities (treated ). "community": bootstrap community memberships. "community_scores": bootstrap community network scores (compute_community_scores = TRUE). "none": skip node-level bootstrap (edge-weight bootstrap still performed reps > 0). progress Logical; TRUE (default), show bootstrap progress bar progressr package available.

title: Estimate MGM network with bootstrap centrality, bridge metrics, clustering, and (optionally) community scores with CIs — mixMN
text: object class c("mixmashnet", "mixMN_fit"), list following top-level components: call matched function call. settings List main settings used call, including reps, cluster_method, exclude_from_graph, exclude_from_cluster, treat_singletons_as_excluded, boot_what. model List : mgm (fitted mgm object), nodes (character vector node names), n (number observations), p (number variables). graph List describing graph: igraph (igraph object built keep_nodes_graph, edge attributes weight, abs_weight, sign vertex attribute membership communities), keep_nodes_graph (nodes retained graph node-level metrics), keep_nodes_cluster (nodes used community detection). communities List describing community structure : original_membership (integer vector community labels keep_nodes_cluster), groups (factor community labels actually used bridge metrics, optionally singletons treated excluded), palette (named vector colors per community), boot_memberships (list bootstrap memberships "community" requested boot_what, otherwise empty list). statistics List node- edge-level summaries: node list : true (data frame one row per node keep_nodes_graph, containing node name metrics strength, ei1, closeness, betweenness, bridge_strength, bridge_betweenness, bridge_closeness, bridge_ei1, bridge_ei2, nodes treated excluded communities also bridge_strength_excluded, bridge_betweenness_excluded, bridge_closeness_excluded, bridge_ei1_excluded, bridge_ei2_excluded); boot (list bootstrap matrices metric, dimension reps × length(keep_nodes_graph), possibly NULL metric requested reps = 0); ci (list CIs node metric, one p × 2 matrix per metric, columns 2.5% 97.5%, NULL bootstrap performed).   community_scores List containing community network scores (compute_community_scores = TRUE): obj (EGAnet::net.scores object, NULL score computation failed), df (data frame subject IDs column id standardized community scores remaining columns), ci (list lower upper matrices, subjects × communities, CIs community scores, NULL bootstrap performed), boot (list data frames, one per bootstrap replication, community scores, NULL "community_scores" requested boot_what reps = 0).
code: \code{edge} is a list with: \code{true} (data frame with columns \code{edge} and \code{weight} for all unique undirected edges among \code{keep_nodes_graph}); \code{boot} (matrix of bootstrap edge weights of dimension \code{n_edges × reps}); and \code{ci} (matrix of CIs for edge weights, \code{n_edges × 2}, with columns \code{2.5%} and \code{97.5%}, or \code{NULL} if \code{reps = 0}).

title: Estimate MGM network with bootstrap centrality, bridge metrics, clustering, and (optionally) community scores with CIs — mixMN
text: function call future::plan(). enable parallel bootstrap, set plan (e.g. future::plan(multisession)) calling mixMN(). boot_what "none" reps > 0, node-level metrics bootstrapped edge-weight bootstrap corresponding CIs still computed.

what: Build MixMashNet metrics from a signed weighted adjacency matrix — mixMN_from_wadj
title: Build MixMashNet metrics from a signed weighted adjacency matrix — mixMN_from_wadj
text: Low-level constructor computes clustering, centrality, bridge metrics signed weighted adjacency matrix. returns mixMN_fit object analogous quello prodotto da mixMN(), ma stimato direttamente da wadj_signed invece che da mgm(). arguments reps, seed_boot, boot_what stored $settings compatibility bootstrap-based functions, bootstrap performed inside function.

title: Build MixMashNet metrics from a signed weighted adjacency matrix — mixMN_from_wadj
code: mixMN_from_wadj(   wadj_signed,   nodes,   conf_level = 0.95,   exclude_from_graph = NULL,   exclude_from_cluster = NULL,   cluster_method = c("louvain", "fast_greedy", "infomap", "walktrap", "edge_betweenness"),   reps = 0,   seed_boot = NULL,   treat_singletons_as_excluded = FALSE,   boot_what = c("general_index", "interlayer_index", "bridge_index", "excluded_index",     "community", "community_scores", "none") )

title: Build MixMashNet metrics from a signed weighted adjacency matrix — mixMN_from_wadj
text: wadj_signed Square numeric matrix signed edge weights (rows/columns = nodes). Typically wadj * signs mgm. nodes Character vector node names (must match rownames(wadj_signed) colnames(wadj_signed)). conf_level Confidence level percentile bootstrap CIs (default 0.95). Stored $settings consistency mixMN(). exclude_from_graph Character vector nodes exclude entirely graph (edges, centralities). exclude_from_cluster Character vector nodes exclude clustering (remain graph, community label). cluster_method Community detection algorithm, one c("louvain","fast_greedy","infomap","walktrap","edge_betweenness"). reps Integer; number bootstrap replications. Currently used inside function, saved $settings$reps consistency mixMN() downstream bootstrap utilities. seed_boot Optional integer; bootstrap seed, stored $settings used . treat_singletons_as_excluded Logical; TRUE, communities size 1 treated "excluded" (nodes receive NA community labels). boot_what Character vector specifying quantities meant bootstrapped higher-level functions: can include "general_index", "interlayer_index", "bridge_index", "excluded_index", "community", "community_scores", "none". value stored $settings$boot_what bootstrap computed .

title: Build MixMashNet metrics from a signed weighted adjacency matrix — mixMN_from_wadj
text: object class c("mixmashnet","mixMN_fit") : graph List : igraph (signed network), keep_nodes_graph, keep_nodes_cluster. communities List empirical community structure (original_membership, groups), color palette (palette), empty boot_memberships. statistics Node-level metrics $statistics$node$true (strength, EI1, closeness, betweenness, bridge metrics, including "excluded" versions) edge weights $statistics$edge$true. Bootstrap slots ($statistics$node$boot, $statistics$edge$boot, $statistics$node$ci, $statistics$edge$ci) set NULL. community_scores Empty containers (obj, df, ci, boot) eventual community scores. settings List echoing main arguments (reps, cluster_method, exclude_from_graph, exclude_from_cluster, treat_singletons_as_excluded, boot_what).

title: Build MixMashNet metrics from a signed weighted adjacency matrix — mixMN_from_wadj
text: Centrality indices computed signed matrix wadj_signed (via qgraph::centrality), distances closeness betweenness based \(|w|\) edge length \(1/|w|\). Bridge metrics computed separately absolute signed graphs using bridge_metrics() bridge_metrics_excluded().

what: Multilayer MGM with bootstrap, intra-/inter-layer metrics, and CIs — multimixMN
title: Multilayer MGM with bootstrap, intra-/inter-layer metrics, and CIs — multimixMN
text: Estimates multilayer Mixed Graphical Model (MGM) using mask enforces cross-layer edges allowed according layer_rules. Within layer, function computes community structure, non-parametric row-bootstrap node centralities edges, bridge metrics (including metrics nodes treated "excluded"), (optionally) community network scores. also returns interlayer-node metrics cross-layer edge summaries.

title: Multilayer MGM with bootstrap, intra-/inter-layer metrics, and CIs — multimixMN
code: multimixMN(   data,   type,   level,   layers,   layer_rules,   scale = TRUE,   reps = 100,   lambdaSel = c("CV", "EBIC"),   lambdaFolds = 5,   lambdaGam = 0.25,   alphaSeq = 1,   alphaSel = "CV",   alphaFolds = 5,   alphaGam = 0.25,   k = 2,   ruleReg = "AND",   threshold = "LW",   overparameterize = FALSE,   thresholdCat = TRUE,   conf_level = 0.95,   exclude_from_graph = NULL,   exclude_from_cluster = NULL,   seed_model = NULL,   seed_boot = NULL,   treat_singletons_as_excluded = FALSE,   cluster_method = c("louvain", "fast_greedy", "infomap", "walktrap", "edge_betweenness"),   compute_community_scores = FALSE,   boot_what = c("general_index", "interlayer_index", "bridge_index", "excluded_index",     "community", "community_scores", "none"),   progress = TRUE )

title: Multilayer MGM with bootstrap, intra-/inter-layer metrics, and CIs — multimixMN
text: data numeric matrix data frame (n × p) variables columns. type Length-p vector variable types required mgm::mgm. level Length-p vector variable levels required mgm::mgm. layers named vector (names = variable names) assigning node layer (character factor). Must cover columns data. layer_rules logical numeric square matrix row/column names equal layer names. Values TRUE 1 indicate cross-layer edges allowed corresponding layer pair. Intra-layer edges always allowed; diagonal NA, treated allowed. scale Logical; TRUE (default) Gaussian variables (type == "g") z-standardized internally mgm(). Use scale = FALSE data already standardized. reps Integer (>= 0). Number bootstrap replications (row resampling replacement). reps = 0, bootstrap performed. lambdaSel Method lambda selection mgm: "CV" "EBIC". lambdaFolds Number folds CV (lambdaSel = "CV"). lambdaGam EBIC gamma parameter (lambdaSel = "EBIC"). alphaSeq Alpha parameters elastic net penalty (values \((0, 1]\)). alphaSel Method selecting alpha parameter: "CV" "EBIC". alphaFolds Number folds CV (alphaSel = "CV"). alphaGam EBIC gamma parameter (alphaSel = "EBIC"). k Integer (>= 1). Order modeled interactions. ruleReg Rule combine neighborhood estimates: "" "". threshold Threshold edge-weights set zero: "LW", "HW" "none". overparameterize Logical; TRUE uses -parameterized version mgm. thresholdCat Logical; FALSE thresholds categorical variables set zero. conf_level Confidence level percentile bootstrap CIs (default 0.95). Must single number 0 1 (e.g., 0.90, 0.95, 0.99). exclude_from_graph Character vector node names. Nodes set excluded global graph node-level metrics. exclude_from_cluster Character vector node names. Nodes set excluded community detection addition exclude_from_graph. seed_model Optional integer seed reproducibility initial MGM fit. seed_boot Optional integer seed passed future.apply reproducibility bootstrap replications. treat_singletons_as_excluded Logical; TRUE, singleton communities (size 1) treated "excluded" computing bridge metrics related summaries. cluster_method Community detection algorithm applied within layer. One "louvain", "fast_greedy", "infomap", "walktrap", "edge_betweenness". compute_community_scores Logical; TRUE, compute community network scores (EGAnet standardized std.scores) bootstrap arrays confidence intervals. boot_what Character vector specifying quantities bootstrap. Valid options : "general_index" (intra-layer centrality indices), "interlayer_index" (interlayer-node metrics), "bridge_index" (bridge metrics nodes communities), "excluded_index" (bridge metrics nodes treated excluded), "community" (bootstrap community memberships), "community_scores" (bootstrap community scores, compute_community_scores = TRUE), "none" (skip node-level bootstrap: edge-weight bootstrap performed reps > 0). progress Logical; TRUE (default), show bootstrap progress bar progressr package available.

title: Multilayer MGM with bootstrap, intra-/inter-layer metrics, and CIs — multimixMN
text: object class c("mixmashnet", "multimixMN_fit"). returned list contains least following components: call: matched function call. settings: list main settings (e.g., reps, cluster_method, exclude_from_graph, exclude_from_cluster, treat_singletons_as_excluded, boot_what). model: list fitted masked mgm object basic information data (nodes, n, p). layers: list describing multilayer structure (assignment nodes layers layer_rules matrix used). layer_fits: named list (one element per layer) single-layer fits, including community structure, node-level statistics, edge-level statistics, bridge metrics, (optionally) community scores bootstrap information. interlayer: list collecting interlayer-node metrics (strength, expected influence, closeness, betweenness, without bootstrap) cross-layer edge summaries allowed pair layers. graph: list containing global igraph object built retained nodes (keep_nodes_graph), vertex attributes name, layer, membership, edge attributes weight, abs_weight, sign, type (intra vs inter) layer_pair.

title: Multilayer MGM with bootstrap, intra-/inter-layer metrics, and CIs — multimixMN
text: function call future::plan(). enable parallel bootstrap, set plan (e.g. future::plan(multisession)) calling multimixMN(). "none" element boot_what reps > 0, node-level metrics bootstrapped, intra- inter-layer edge-weight bootstrap corresponding confidence intervals still computed.

title: Multilayer MGM with bootstrap, intra-/inter-layer metrics, and CIs — multimixMN
text: Relies internal helpers mgm_masked(), mixMN_from_wadj(), bridge_metrics(), bridge_metrics_excluded(), must available package namespace.

title: NHANES dataset — nhanes
text: Example dataset used MixMashNet examples. dataset contains 29 variables derived National Health Nutrition Examination Survey (NHANES)

title: NHANES dataset — nhanes
NHANES dataset — nhanes
text: data frame 2759 rows 29 variables: TotChol Total Cholesterol (numeric). HDL High-density lipoprotein cholesterol (numeric). Creatinine Creatinine (numeric). UricAcid Uric acid (numeric). ALT Alanine aminotransferase (numeric). AST Aspartate aminotransferase (numeric). GGT Gamma-glutamyl transferase (numeric). Bilirubin Bilirubin (numeric). Albumin Albumin (numeric). TotProtein Total protein (numeric). HbA1c Glycated hemoglobin (numeric). hsCRP High-sensitivity C-reactive protein (numeric). BMI Body mass index (numeric). Waist waist circumference (numeric). Height Height (numeric). ArmCirc Arm circumference (numeric). HipCirc Hip circumference (numeric). LegLength Leg length (numeric). ArmLength Arm Length (numeric). TroubleSleep Trouble Sleep 0=1=yes. PhysicalActivity Physical Activity 0=1=yes. Smoke Smoking 0=1=yes. Drug Drug use 0=1=yes. Diet Dietary quality 1=Poor, 2=Fair, 3=Good, 4=good, 5=Excellent. Alcohol Alcohol consumption 0=1=yes. Work Employment status (1–4: working; employed absent; seeking work; working). MonInc Monthly income category (1–12), higher values indicate higher income. Gender Gender 0=male 1=female. Age Age (numeric).

title: NHANES dataset — nhanes
NHGH dataset — nhgh_data
text: Example dataset used MixMashNet examples. dataset contains 15 variables derived National Health Nutrition Examination Survey (NHANES)

title: NHGH dataset — nhgh_data
NHGH dataset — nhgh_data
text: data frame 5621 rows 15 variables: wt Weight (numeric). ht Height (numeric). bmi Body mass index (numeric). leg Leg length (numeric). arml Arm length (numeric). armc Arm circumference (numeric). tri Triceps skinfold (numeric). sub Subscapular skinfold (numeric). gh Glychohemoglobin (numeric). albumin Albumin (numeric). bun Blood urea nitrogen (numeric). what: Plot method for MixMashNet objects — plot.mixmashnet
title: Plot method for MixMashNet objects — plot.mixmashnet
text: Unified plotting interface objects returned mixMN() multimixMN(). Depending , can: = "network": plot estimated network (single-layer multilayer); = "intra": plot intra-layer node/edge statistics 95\ = "inter": plot interlayer node metrics interlayer edge weights 95\ plotInterlayer() chosen statistics; = "stability": plot node stability within communities based bootstrap community assignments.

title: Plot method for MixMashNet objects — plot.mixmashnet
code: # S3 method for class 'mixmashnet' plot(x, what = c("network", "intra", "inter", "stability"), layer = NULL, ...)

title: Plot method for MixMashNet objects — plot.mixmashnet
text: x object class mixmashnet, returned mixMN() multimixMN(). Type plot produce. One c("network","intra","inter","stability"). missing, default chosen based presence centrality-related arguments whether x single-layer multilayer (see Details). layer Optional layer name. = "intra" = "stability" multimixMN_fit object, selects layer-specific fit use. NULL, behaviour depends : = "network": plots global multilayer network; = "intra" "stability" multilayer: either layers plotted combined layout error raised context ambiguous. ... Additional arguments passed underlying helpers: = "intra": forwarded plotCentrality(), e.g. statistics, ordering, standardize, edges_top_n, exclude_nodes, color_by_community. = "inter": forwarded plotInterlayer(), e.g. statistics, pairs, edges_top_n, ordering, standardize, nodes_layer. = "stability": forwarded membershipStab_plot(), e.g. title. = "network": forwarded internal network plotting helpers .plot_network_single() .plot_network_multi(), e.g. color_by, edge_color_by, vertex_size.

title: Plot method for MixMashNet objects — plot.mixmashnet
text: != "network", ggplot object returned. = "network", corresponding network plotting helper called side-effect x returned invisibly.

title: Summarize MixMashNet fits (single- and multilayer) in long format — summary.mixmashnet
code: # S3 method for class 'mixmashnet' summary(   object,   what = c("intra", "inter"),   statistics = NULL,   layer = NULL,   pairs = NULL,   digits = 3,   ... )

title: Summarize MixMashNet fits (single- and multilayer) in long format — summary.mixmashnet
text: object object class "mixmashnet" returned mixMN() multimixMN(). Character string indicating part model summarize: "intra": intra-layer quantities (node-level indices /intra-layer edges); "inter": interlayer quantities (node-level indices interlayer-graph /cross-layer edges; multilayer fits ). statistics Character vector specifying statistics include. = "intra", valid values : c("edges",          "strength", "expected_influence", "closeness", "betweenness",          "bridge_strength", "bridge_closeness", "bridge_betweenness",          "bridge_ei1", "bridge_ei2",          "bridge_strength_excluded", "bridge_betweenness_excluded",          "bridge_closeness_excluded", "bridge_ei1_excluded",          "bridge_ei2_excluded"). = "inter", valid values : c("edges", "strength", "expected_influence", "closeness",          "betweenness"). statistics = NULL, : = "intra", available intra-layer statistics (including "edges") returned; = "inter", available interlayer statistics (including "edges") returned. layer Optional character vector layer names subset. Used = "intra" multilayer fits. Ignored single-layer fits. pairs Optional character vector layer-pair names (e.g. "bio_dis") used = "inter" summarizing interlayer edges. NULL, available layer pairs included. interlayer node indices, pairs can used restrict summary nodes belonging one layers given pair. digits Number digits round numeric summaries. ... used (S3 compatibility).

title: Summarize MixMashNet fits (single- and multilayer) in long format — summary.mixmashnet
text: list (class "summary.mixmashnet") four data frames: $index: intra-layer node-level indices (one row per node-metric); $edges: intra-layer edges (one row per edge); $interlayer_index: interlayer-node indices; $interlayer_edges: cross-layer edges. Depending statistics, elements may NULL.
